channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Italy makes a surprising discovery ahead of the Winter Olympics: dinosaur tracks
item.description: A nature photographer stumbled upon thousands of 210-million-year-old dinosaur tracks in Italy's central Alps, near where some Olympic skiing and snow...

item.title: Federal court says troops can stay in D.C., and hints at prolonged deployment
item.description: A federal appeals court in Washington, D.C. has ruled that National Guard troops can remain in the city for now. That decision comes after a different...

item.title: A Chinese man who filmed secret footage in Xinjiang risks deportation from the U.S.
item.description: Guan Heng sailed to the U.S. by boat from the Bahamas after publishing footage he filmed of purported detention camps in China. He has been held in im...

item.title: Trump to address the nation as his popularity dips in the face of economic concerns
item.description: The year-end speech will address his accomplishments so far and look ahead to next year

item.title: Jack Smith defends his prosecutions of Trump in closed-door session in Congress

item.title: Officials looking for someone who may have encountered person of interest in Brown shooting

item.title: Nick Reiner appears in court, arraignment set for Jan. 7 in killing of parents
item.description: Nick Reiner​ appeared in court on Wednesday on two counts of murder in the killing of his parents, Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner.

item.title: What to know about the search for the Brown University shooter
Jack Smith defends Trump prosecutions in testimony to Congress
item.description: The former US Special Counsel is facing questions about his two defunct criminal investigations into President Donald Trump.

item.title: Spain to open network of climate shelters
item.description: Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez says the shelters will be in public buildings across the country.

item.title: Investigators seek older video that might show the Brown campus shooter days before the attack

item.title: Starmer tells Abramovich to 'pay up now' or face court
item.description: The Prime Minister said Roman Abramovich should make good on his pledge that money from the sale of Chelsea FC would go to benefit Ukrainians

item.title: South Carolina health officials urge measles vaccinations as cases rise in the state
item.description: More than 160 people in South Carolina are under quarantine as the state battles a growing number of measles cases. Dr. William Schaffner, professor o...

item.title: The Oscars to leave ABC and stream on YouTube starting in 2029
item.description: The show was hosted by ABC for more than a half-century and reveals the latest major shakeup in Hollywood.

item.title: Heavy rains worsen conditions for displaced Gazans, UN warns
item.description: Gaza's health ministry says one baby has died from hypothermia and 11 other people have died in building collapses over the past week.

item.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed to be NASA administrator after second nomination
item.description: President Trump withdrew Isaacman's nomination in April, before reissuing​ it again in November.

item.title: Brown mourns the loss of an aspiring doctor and campus leader to the campus attack
